attributes.action: Do not implement mandatory Covid-19 vaccinations to enter halls or lectures.
attributes.background: Making the COVID-19 vaccination mandatory to enter university halls and lectures is discriminatory to citizens with health and religious needs that are against the use of vaccinations. This is and should always be protected by the Equality Act 2010.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593410
